attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im frustrated that the digital switchover should be so long winded.WHY oh WHY do we have to live in this nanny state.Maybe a few months but not years and years of waiting.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
